Heading section

h1 heading take the most text size

This example talk about unorder list tag

  • mustafa
  • mahmoood

This example talk about order list tag

  1. mustafa
  2. mahmoood

Note The different between unorder list and order list is order list indicate the number of list item unorder list => item list indicate a small dot
